statements: SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id = 1;
SELECT internal_data, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id > 10;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id = 5;
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id < 20;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data = 'test';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT MAX(internal_id) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT AVG(external_id) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT MIN(internal_id), MAX(internal_id) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT internal_id, SUM(external_id) FROM reconciliation_data GROUP BY internal_id;
SELECT DISTINCT external_id FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT internal_id, COUNT(*) FROM reconciliation_data GROUP BY internal_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT internal_data) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data ORDER BY internal_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(external_id) AS avg_external_id FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT internal_id, UPPER(internal_data) FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id = 100;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id > 500;
SELECT internal_id, external_id, internal_data, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id < 200 AND external_id > 300;
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT internal_id, external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data IS NOT NULL AND external_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data = 'approved' ORDER BY external_id DESC;
SELECT internal_id, external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id IN (100, 200, 300);
SELECT internal_id, external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data NOT LIKE '%obsolete%';
SELECT COUNT(internal_id) AS total_records FROM reconciliation_data;
SELECT internal_id, external_id FROM reconciliation_data LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id BETWEEN 200 AND 400;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id = (SELECT MAX(external_id) FROM reconciliation_data);
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id IN (SELECT external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data = 'pending');
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id = ANY (SELECT external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data = 'rejected');
SELECT internal_id, internal_data, external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id = (SELECT MAX(internal_id) FROM reconciliation_data);
SELECT internal_id, external_id, internal_data, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_data LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY internal_id ASC;
SELECT external_id, external_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data = (SELECT internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id = 50);
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_id > (SELECT AVG(internal_id) FROM reconciliation_data);
SELECT internal_id, external_id FROM reconciliation_data WHERE external_id = (SELECT external_id FROM reconciliation_data ORDER BY internal_id DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT internal_id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data WHERE internal_data REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';

SELECT * FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE log_id = 5 AND action = 'start';
SELECT id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE action = 'start' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE external_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data_sources;
SELECT id, internal_data FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE id > 10;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE external_data LIKE '%search%';
SELECT rd.id, rl.log_id FROM reconciliation_data_sources rd JOIN reconciliation_logs rl ON rd.id = rl.log_id;
SELECT rd.id, ra.action, ra.timestamp FROM reconciliation_data_sources rd JOIN reconciliation_logs rl ON rd.id = rl.log_id WHERE rd.id = 5;

SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM reconciliation_data_sources;

SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE id NOT IN (1,2,3);
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_data_sources WHERE external_data IS NULL;

SELECT reconciliation_type AS type, status FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT internal_data, COUNT(*) FROM reconciliation_internal_data GROUP BY internal_data HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_internal_data WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM reconciliation_external_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-12-31');
SELECT log_id, status FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE reconciliation_type = 'payment' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_external_data WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) FROM reconciliation_internal_data GROUP BY timestamp HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT DISTINCT source_name FROM internal_data_sources INNER JOIN external_data_sources ON internal_data_sources.source_name = external_data_sources.source_name;

SELECT MIN(last_updated) FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT job_id, status, created_at FROM reconciliation_jobs WHERE status = 'in_progress' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) FROM reconciliation_logs GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT job_id, message, log_timestamp FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT internal_data_sources.id, external_data_sources.id, reconciliation_jobs.status FROM internal_data_sources JOIN reconciliation_jobs ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_jobs.internal_source_id JOIN external_data_sources ON reconciliation_jobs.external_source_id = external_data_sources.id;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT id, source_name, last_updated FROM internal_data_sources WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' AND last_updated <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT job_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM reconciliation_logs GROUP BY job_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT internal_data_sources.source_name FROM internal_data_sources LEFT JOIN reconciliation_jobs ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_jobs.internal_source_id WHERE reconciliation_jobs.job_id IS NULL;
SELECT job_id, status, created_at FROM reconciliation_jobs WHERE status = 'failed' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT source_name, COUNT(status) AS total_jobs FROM internal_data_sources JOIN reconciliation_jobs ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_jobs.internal_source_id GROUP BY source_name ORDER BY total_jobs DESC;

SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources AS ids, external_data_sources AS eds, reconciliation_jobs AS rj, reconciliation_logs AS rl WHERE ids.id = rj.internal_source_id AND eds.id = rj.external_source_id AND rj.job_id = rl.job_id;
SELECT job_id, MAX(log_timestamp) AS latest_log FROM reconciliation_logs GROUP BY job_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM internal_data_sources UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT id FROM internal_data_sources WHERE id IN (SELECT internal_source_id FROM reconciliation_jobs WHERE status = 'running');

SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM internal_data_sources;

SELECT log_id, reconciliation_date FROM reconciliation_logs;

SELECT result_id, internal_source_id, external_source_id FROM reconciliation_results;

SELECT setting_id, rule_name FROM reconciliation_settings;

SELECT id, source_name FROM internal_data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%data%';

SELECT log_id, reconciliation_date FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE reconciliation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_results WHERE match_result = TRUE;
SELECT rule_name, match_threshold FROM reconciliation_settings WHERE match_threshold > 50;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources INNER JOIN reconciliation_results ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_results.internal_source_id;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources LEFT JOIN reconciliation_results ON external_data_sources.id = reconciliation_results.external_source_id;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources RIGHT JOIN reconciliation_results ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_results.internal_source_id;

SELECT source_name FROM internal_data_sources WHERE id = 3 AND source_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM internal_data_sources WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT api_key, endpoint_url FROM external_data_sources WHERE api_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_name AS source, connection_string AS connection FROM internal_data_sources WHERE source_name = 'Example';
SELECT source_name, connection_string FROM internal_data_sources WHERE connection_string LIKE '%localhost%' OR connection_string LIKE '%127.0.0.1%';
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE reconciliation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT log_id, status FROM reconciliation_logs WHERE status = 'Failed' AND error_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_results WHERE match_result = TRUE;
SELECT result_id, log_id, internal_source_id, external_source_id FROM reconciliation_results WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT result_id, log_id, match_result FROM reconciliation_results WHERE internal_source_id = 5 AND external_source_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_settings WHERE match_threshold > 70;
SELECT rule_name FROM reconciliation_settings WHERE setting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources INNER JOIN external_data_sources ON internal_data_sources.id = external_data_sources.id;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources LEFT JOIN reconciliation_logs ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_logs.log_id;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources RIGHT JOIN reconciliation_results ON external_data_sources.id = reconciliation_results.external_source_id;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources INNER JOIN reconciliation_settings ON external_data_sources.id = reconciliation_settings.setting_id;
SELECT * FROM internal_data_sources INNER JOIN reconciliation_results ON internal_data_sources.id = reconciliation_results.internal_source_id;
SELECT * FROM reconciliation_results LEFT JOIN reconciliation_settings ON reconciliation_results.result_id = reconciliation_settings.setting_id;
